pageProduct.name: Alya Skin Vitamin C Supercharged Serum 35ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Enriched with natural Australian ingredients, this Vit C Supercharged Serum will keep your skin hydrated, glowy and free-radical damage.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of direct sunlight. Avoid contact with eyes and mouth area. If irritation occurs, cease use.

Common Uses

Say Bye-Bye to dull dry skin and the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Say Hello to soft, smooth and supple skin, with improved collagen production and skin elasticity. Enriched with natural Australian ingredients, this Vit C Supercharged Serum will keep your skin hydrated, glowy and free-radical damage.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Propanediol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, yzygium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilly) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, CI 16035 (FD&C Red No.40), Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Metabisulfite, Citric Acid

Directions

Use in the AM and PM after cleansing and/or using the pink clay mask. Apply 1-2 pumps to face and neck.
